c74object.name: the.streamfunnel
c74object.digest: Prepend an increasing index to any number of items
c74object.description:
Written by Tim Heinze Â© 2017, www.xenorama.com.
An incoming list is iterated into groups of identical sizes and prepended by an increasing index. Arguments of '1 0' yield the native behaviour of listfunnel.

inlet.digest: list of any nubmer of items
inlet.description: The list length has to be dividable by the first argument given.

objarg.name: length
objarg.description: list length to be extracted. The input list has to hold entries multiple by the first argument given.

objarg.name: offset
objarg.description: First index. All following lists will increase on the offset.

method.name: list
method.description: Has to be dividable by the first argument given.
